name: Attack on Console
description:
Have you ever thought to yourself: “30 fps is too slow”? Then you are probably a PC gamer, and as such its up to us to save those less fortunate plebs who find themselves unable to compete against the superior platform. Join the cause to help save these poor Mii’s.

Recently the PC Masterrace has broken through the 4thnite wall and has opened up cross platform competition creating unbalance in the land. The PC’s have wreaked havoc on all console players who are unable to detect the PC’s high framerates & low latency.
